meanings.definition: A division of a distribution of a statistical variable into one hundred parts.
meanings.sent1: In the data set, the centiles help us understand how the values are spread out.
meanings.sent2: Her height centile showed that she was taller than most kids her age.
meanings.sent3: The centiles in the graph were having a party, each representing a different group of values.
meanings.sent4: The centiles acted like markers, dividing the data into equal parts for analysis.
meanings.sent5: The concept of centiles made it easier to compare different sections of the data distribution.

meanings.definition: A value on a scale of one hundred that indicates the position of a value in a distribution.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that her weight centile was above average for her age group.
meanings.sent2: On the growth chart, her centile was right in the middle, showing normal development.
meanings.sent3: The centile on the scale seemed to be waving at the other values as they passed by.
meanings.sent4: His test score centile was like a beacon, guiding him towards improvement.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the centile helped pinpoint where a value stood relative to others in the set.
